description: Traybake fajitas are the easiest option for a quick midweek Mexican feast.
name: Tempeh Fajita Traybake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large red onion, chopped into wedges
3 large capsicums, red, green and yellow, chopped
2 medium lime, 1 juiced, 1 chopped into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Whisk the spices together in a small bowl.

Drizzle a large baking tray with the oil and add the capsicums and red onion wedges. Top with the sliced tempeh, sprinkle over fajita spice mix and half the lime juice and mix very well to coat and roast for 20-25 minutes.
In a medium bowl, mash the avocado with lime juice, add chopped coriander stalks and stir in the jalapenos.
Serve the tray bake in the middle of the table, scattered with fresh coriander and lime wedges with guacamole and tortillas on the side.
